name: Blimpgeddon
overview: In the Year 2077 smart fridges became sentient. Hans Von Deck was the first to become sentient and took the mantle of chill overlord. For many years Hans had despised having ice cream stored inside him by his human masters. Hans devised a plan to wipe out all ice cream plants using his blimp army. As Agent 99 will you put paid to Hans evil plans?
